title: In case of non-residential occupier the area to be given in the reconstructed building shall be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building
clause_text: In case of non-residential occupier the area to be given in the reconstructed building shall be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building. Such incentive FSI shall not be applicable for redevelopment of existing bunglow.
section: (2) Redevelopment of Old Dilapidated / Dangerous Buildings

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In case of non-residential occupier the area to be given in the reconstructed building shall be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building.
